abstract: The social network includes an option in the settings for displaying nicer-looking versions of the pictures you upload from your phone.
snippet: The social network includes an option in the settings for displaying nicer-looking versions of the pictures you upload from your phone.
lead_paragraph: Q. I have a great camera on my phone, but whenever I upload photos to Facebook, the pictures look decidedly lower in quality online. How do I get Facebook to display the photos I upload in higher definition?

headline.main: Get Your Photos Looking Better on Facebook
